mokada amathaka. 1997 palath palana mathiwaranayen kolambaa maha nagara sabhawata theri pathwela api katayuthu karapu andama mata ada wagema mathakayi” wimal wirawansha kiya.wesak kalapaya narambaimen anathuruwa ehi thibu kopi dansalen kopi koppayaka rasa balimata da wimal wirawansha ha mohomad musammil athulu aaradhithayo amathaka nokalaha.amathya wimal wirawansha pasugiya 10 wanida wawuniyawa bala pitathwuye edinata yedi thibu itha wadagath karthawyayakataya.rajya ukas ha aayojana bankuwe wawuniya shakhawa ha sewa madhyasthanaya wiwrutha kirimath 8%ka sahanadayi poliyakata wawuniya disthrikkaye niwasa ahimi pawul 150kata rupiyal laksha 02 bagin naya mudal pradanaya kirimath eki wadagath karthawyaya.me awasthawata pamina siti ukas ha aayojana bankuwe sabhapathi nithignya jagath wallawaththa athulu niladharin wimal wirawansha piligath athara jagath wallawaththa thama kathawedi wishesha karunu kihipayakma anawaranaya kara sitiyeya.”me banku shakhawa pihituwimata mul wune wimal wirawansha amathithumayi.

aarthika yuddhaya jaya ganima sandaha deshiya nishpadakayan, karmanthakaruwan pramukha siyalu shri lankikayan eekarashi kotagena swayanposhitha ratak godanangima siya aramuna bawa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha pawasiya.pitaratin gena ena bhandawalata yatawi ape aarthikaya kada binda ganime awashyathawak nomathi bawa sandahan kala janadhipathiwaraya deshiya nishpadakayan shakthimath kara ape de pitaratata yawana mattamata apa langa wiya yuthu bawath kiweya.janadhipathiwaraya me adahas pala kele mawu bima lanka padanama sanwidhana kala surya sinha sahathika pathra pradanaya kirime awasthawata araliyagaha mandirayedi eeye (25) ek wemini.samagam 36k me thunwana surya sinha jathika mahothsawayedi surya sinha sahathika pathra dina gath athara hapi kuk , ran batha saha susiko bekars yana samagam surya sinha swarna hansa wishesha sammana dina gaththeya.thrasthawadaya parajaya kara samruddhimath jathiyak godanangime pasubima sakasima wenuwen janadhipathithumata mehidi sammanayak pirinamana ladi.ape de pilibanda apatama aadambarayak menma ape shakthiya pilibanda wishwasayakda apa thula thibiya yuthu bawath kiweya.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha meseda pawasiya.mama mulinma ada me sammana labagaththa siyalu denata subapathanawa.
